availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bracken County, Kentucky, resident. Native of Germany. Married to Jacob Diebold in Hamilton County, Ohio, on September 5, 1850. Mother of Philomena Rosa Diebold and Jacob Diebold. Resident of Bracken County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, p. 206.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, p. 345B.
Ohio Marriages, Various Ohio County Courthouses, Hamilton County Marriages, Film #000344463.
